cardDetailedText: I started working at the grocery store KIWI when I was 15, stocking shelves and helping customers. When I turned 18, I became shift manager.
I did my 18 month conscription period as a dog handler in the Military Police.
I worked as an alarm operator, calling out to customers from the alarm station, often interracting with emergency services.
Helped produce social media content for the social media platforms for the Institute of Informatics, UiO.

I first became a teching assistant the fall of 2022, teaching IN1000: Introduction to object oriented programming, then again the spring of 2023, where I tought IN1010: Object oriented programming. I was also a supervisor in the cource IN2000: Software Engineering with Project Work, the spring of 2024.

title: 2023-now
cardDetailedText: I had my first internship in Kahoot! after my second year in Uni, in 2023. I am still working there part time (40%) now. I will begin working there full-time after finishing my masters the summer of 2026.
